column_description: A unique identifier for each book in the database

value_description: Book Revue, Baseball Bugs, Holiday for Shoestrings, Quentin Quail, Baby Bottleneck

column_description: The series to which the book belongs, if applicable
A foreign key referencing the 'Author_ID' in the 'author' table, indicating the author of the book
A foreign key referencing the 'Press_ID' in the 'press' table, indicating the publisher of the book
The sales amount of the book, represented as text
The release date of the book, represented as text in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'
